lenses.relationships: Share burdens in partnership. Don't carry relationship work alone.
lenses.work: Delegate or say no. You don't have to do everything to be valuable.
lenses.money: Don't take on all financial burdens alone. Share responsibility. Ask for help.

name: Page of Wands

numerology.meaning: Page is enthusiastic beginner—passionate, curious, eager to explore and create without needing expertise.

upright.meaning: You're excited about something new—creative, passionate, eager to explore. In practice: follow your enthusiasm. Explore boldly. You don't need permission or expertise.

voice.lead_in: This is the 'excited beginner' card. You're passionate. Go explore. You don't need to be good yet.
voice.pulse: Page of Wands upright is enthusiastic exploration—passion without pressure to be expert.
voice.turn: Explore one thing that excites you. Don't wait to be 'ready'—just start.

reversed.meaning: Either you're all excitement and no action (dreaming without doing), or you've lost your passion (bored, uninspired). In practice: if dreaming, start something. If uninspired, find what actually excites you.

voice.lead_in: Page of Wands reversed asks: are you excited but not starting, or have you lost your fire?
voice.pulse: This is the 'all talk or burned out' card—either dreaming without action or passion depleted.
voice.turn: If dreaming: take first action on one excited idea. If uninspired: try something completely new today.

guidance: Follow enthusiasm. Explore boldly. Start without needing to be an expert.
call_to_action: Start one thing that genuinely excites you. Beginner's mind is enough.

direct_guidance.do: Follow your enthusiasm. Explore passionately. Start projects without needing expertise first.
direct_guidance.dont: Don't let lack of skill kill excitement, and don't stay excited without ever starting.
direct_guidance.watch_for: Chronic enthusiasm without action, or refusing to try new things.
questions: What genuinely excites me right now?
Am I excited and exploring, or excited and stalling?
What would I try if I didn't need to be good at it first?
direct_guidance.next_24h: Start one thing you're excited about. Don't wait for permission or expertise.
direct_guidance.relationships: Bring fresh enthusiasm to connection. Try new things together. Stay curious.
direct_guidance.work: Pursue projects that genuinely excite you. Passion creates better work than obligation.
direct_guidance.money: Explore new income streams that excite you. Enthusiasm fuels persistence.
direct_guidance.reversed_shift: Reversed means you're either all talk or uninspired. Recalibrate: start if dreaming, explore new things if bored.
direct_guidance.shadow: Chronic dreaming without action, or losing all passion and refusing to explore.
direct_guidance.mantra: I feel the fire. I explore boldly. I start now.
direct_guidance.quick: Follow enthusiasm. Explore passionately. Start without expertise. Next 24h: Begin one thing that excites you.
direct_guidance.poetic_hint: Page of Wands holds a blooming staff, looking at it with wonder. Excited. Curious. Ready to explore. That's enough. Go.

lenses.relationships: Bring fresh enthusiasm to connection. Try new things together. Stay curious.
lenses.work: Pursue projects that genuinely excite you. Passion creates better work than obligation.
lenses.money: Explore new income streams that excite you. Enthusiasm fuels persistence.

name: Knight of Wands

numerology.meaning: Knight is bold action and adventurous pursuit—charging forward with passion, sometimes recklessly.

upright.meaning: Act boldly. Chase the adventure. Follow passion with full commitment. In practice: take risks. Move fast. Let passion drive action—but stay aware.

voice.lead_in: This is the 'charge into adventure' card. Bold. Passionate. All in. Go.
voice.pulse: Knight of Wands upright is passionate pursuit—bold action driven by fire and commitment.
voice.turn: Do one bold thing today. Chase what excites you. Don't hold back.

reversed.meaning: Either you're reckless (all passion, no thought), or you've lost your fire (playing it safe, avoiding risk). In practice: if reckless, add strategy. If timid, take one bold risk.

voice.lead_in: Knight of Wands reversed asks: are you being reckless, or have you stopped taking any risks?
voice.pulse: This is the 'reckless or timid' card—either no brakes or no gas.
voice.turn: If reckless: pause to make one strategic plan. If timid: take one calculated risk today.

guidance: Act boldly. Follow passion. Chase adventure with commitment.
call_to_action: Do one bold thing. Take one passionate risk. Go all in.

direct_guidance.do: Act boldly. Follow passion. Take risks. Chase adventure with full commitment.
direct_guidance.dont: Don't be reckless without thought, and don't play it so safe you never risk anything.
direct_guidance.watch_for: Impulsiveness disguised as passion, or fear disguised as 'being responsible.'
questions: Am I being bold or reckless?
What adventure am I avoiding out of fear?
Where could I take a bigger risk with passion backing me?
direct_guidance.next_24h: Do one bold, passionate thing. Take a risk. Chase what excites you.
direct_guidance.relationships: Pursue connection boldly. Take romantic risks. Be adventurous together.
direct_guidance.work: Take bold career risks. Chase big opportunities. Let passion drive ambition.
direct_guidance.money: Invest boldly in ventures you believe in. Calculated risks create wealth.
direct_guidance.reversed_shift: Reversed means you're either reckless or timid. Recalibrate: add strategy if reckless, take risk if playing safe.
direct_guidance.shadow: Recklessness without strategy, or refusing all risk out of fear.
direct_guidance.mantra: I act boldly. I risk wisely. I follow my fire.
direct_guidance.quick: Act boldly. Follow passion. Take risks. Next 24h: Do one bold, passionate thing.
direct_guidance.poetic_hint: Knight of Wands charges on a rearing horse, staff raised. Bold. Passionate. Fearless. Chase the adventure. Go all in.

lenses.relationships: Pursue connection boldly. Take romantic risks. Be adventurous together.
lenses.work: Take bold career risks. Chase big opportunities. Let passion drive ambition.
lenses.money: Invest boldly in ventures you believe in. Calculated risks create wealth.

name: Queen of Wands

numerology.meaning: Queen is confident magnetism—self-assured, charismatic, able to attract and inspire through authentic fire.

upright.meaning: You're magnetic, confident, and authentic. People are drawn to your fire. In practice: own your power. Lead through charisma. Inspire others by being fully yourself.

voice.lead_in: This is the 'magnetic confidence' card. You're powerful. You know it. Own it.
voice.pulse: Queen of Wands upright is authentic magnetism—confidence that attracts and inspires.
voice.turn: Own your power in one situation today. Lead confidently. Be magnetic.

reversed.meaning: Either you're arrogant (using charisma to dominate), or you've dimmed your light (hiding power, playing small). In practice: if arrogant, humble yourself. If dimmed, shine brighter.

voice.lead_in: Queen of Wands reversed asks: are you using power to dominate, or hiding your fire?
voice.pulse: This is the 'arrogant or dimmed' card—either too much ego or not enough confidence.
voice.turn: If arrogant: listen more than you speak today. If dimmed: take up space unapologetically.

guidance: Own your power. Lead through authentic confidence. Inspire by being fully yourself.
call_to_action: Own your power in one situation. Be magnetic. Lead confidently.

direct_guidance.do: Own your confidence. Lead through authentic charisma. Inspire others naturally.
direct_guidance.dont: Don't use power to dominate, and don't dim your light to make others comfortable.
direct_guidance.watch_for: Arrogance disguised as confidence, or shrinking to avoid threatening others.
questions: Where am I dimming my light to make others comfortable?
Am I leading with confidence or controlling with ego?
What would I do if I fully owned my power?
direct_guidance.next_24h: Take up space unapologetically in one situation. Own your power fully.
direct_guidance.relationships: Be your full self in connection. Magnetic authenticity attracts real love.
direct_guidance.work: Lead with confidence. Inspire through charisma. Own your expertise and power.
direct_guidance.money: Confident self-assurance creates opportunities. Own your worth. Charge accordingly.
direct_guidance.reversed_shift: Reversed means you're either arrogant or dimmed. Recalibrate: humble if dominating, shine if hiding.
direct_guidance.shadow: Arrogance and domination, or dimming your light to avoid threatening others.
direct_guidance.mantra: I own my power. I shine brightly. I inspire naturally.
direct_guidance.quick: Own your power. Lead with authentic confidence. Inspire naturally. Next 24h: Take up space unapologetically.
direct_guidance.poetic_hint: Queen of Wands sits confidently with sunflower and black cat. Magnetic. Self-assured. Authentically powerful. That's you. Own it.

lenses.relationships: Be your full self in connection. Magnetic authenticity attracts real love.
lenses.work: Lead with confidence. Inspire through charisma. Own your expertise and power.
lenses.money: Confident self-assurance creates opportunities. Own your worth. Charge accordingly.

name: King of Wands

numerology.meaning: King is visionary leadership—commanding creative vision, inspiring action, building empires through passion and strategy.

theme: visionary leadership, creative command, inspired action

upright.meaning: You're the visionary leader—inspiring others, commanding creative projects, building something significant. In practice: lead boldly. Cast big vision. Inspire people to create with you.

voice.lead_in: This is the 'visionary builder' card. You see it. You lead it. You make it real.
voice.pulse: King of Wands upright is creative command—vision backed by leadership and inspired action.
voice.turn: Cast one bold vision today. Inspire others to join you. Lead through passion and strategy.

reversed.meaning: Either you're tyrannical (demanding without inspiring), or you're all vision and no execution. In practice: if tyrannical, inspire instead of demanding. If dreaming, execute something.

voice.lead_in: King of Wands reversed asks: are you forcing your vision on others, or are you all talk?
voice.pulse: This is the 'tyrant or dreamer' card—either dominating without inspiring or visioning without executing.
voice.turn: If tyrannical: inspire one person today instead of commanding. If dreaming: execute one thing from your vision.

guidance: Lead visionary projects. Inspire creative action. Build through passion and strategy.
call_to_action: Cast one bold vision. Inspire others to create with you. Lead through example.

direct_guidance.do: Lead boldly. Cast big vision. Inspire people through passion and competence.
direct_guidance.dont: Don't force vision on others, and don't vision forever without executing.
direct_guidance.watch_for: Tyrannical leadership without inspiration, or endless visioning without building.
questions: Am I inspiring people or commanding them?
What bold vision am I called to lead right now?
Am I executing my vision, or just talking about it?
direct_guidance.next_24h: Share one bold vision with someone. Inspire them to join you. Start building.
direct_guidance.relationships: Lead the relationship vision. Inspire your partner. Build the life you both want.
direct_guidance.work: Cast bold vision at work. Inspire teams. Build something significant through leadership.
direct_guidance.money: Build wealth through visionary ventures. Lead, inspire, execute. Create empire.
direct_guidance.reversed_shift: Reversed means you're either tyrannical or all talk. Recalibrate: inspire if commanding, execute if dreaming.
direct_guidance.shadow: Tyrannical leadership, or chronic visioning without building anything real.
direct_guidance.mantra: I see the vision. I inspire action. I build it real.
direct_guidance.quick: Lead boldly. Cast big vision. Inspire creative action. Next 24h: Share one vision, inspire someone to join.
direct_guidance.poetic_hint: King of Wands sits commanding with salamanders on throne. Visionary. Leader. Builder. You see it. You lead it. Make it real.

lenses.relationships: Lead the relationship vision. Inspire your partner. Build the life you both want.
lenses.work: Cast bold vision at work. Inspire teams. Build something significant through leadership.
lenses.money: Build wealth through visionary ventures. Lead, inspire, execute. Create an empire.
